data.text:
Lais Ribeiro was born in Teresina, PiauÃ­, Brazil, on October 5, 1990, is a Brazilian model. She began her career at age of nineteen, modeling locally in Brazil (2009). She walked in the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018. She became a Victoria's Secret Angel in 2015. She wore the "Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra" for the 2017 Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai. Featured in the 2017 and 2018 Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue. Featured in music video for Anitta "Paradinha" (2017). Has a son Alexandre, born in 2008.

Lais Ribeiro body measurements are bust-waist-hip 34-23-33 in inches or 86.5-58.5-84 in cÐµntÑmÐµtrÐµÑ, her bra size is 32B with cup size B.

Relationships

She dated American basketball player Jared Homan (2014-2017) and Mexican model Adrian Cardoso (2012-2013).

She began dating NBA player Joakim Noah in 2018, the couple got married in 2022.

TV Shows

She appeared in comedy sitcom New Girl (2014) in episode "Prince".

Editorials Covers

Maxim Magazine, Harper's Bazaar Singapore, Marie Claire Brazil, Elle Brasil, GQ South Africa, Elle Italia, 10 Magazine, S Moda for El Pais, Harper's Bazaar Arabia, L'Officiel, Harper's Bazaar Brazil, Vogue Germany, Vogue Brasil.

Fashion Shows

Walked runway for Zac Posen, Carolina Herrera, Cushnie et Ochs, Jeremy Scott, Diane von Furstenberg, Jean Paul Gaultier, Philipp Plein, Moschino, Oscar de la Renta, Stephane Rolland, Alexandre Vauthier, Givenchy, Alexis Mabille, Guy Laroche, Marc by Marc Jacobs, Helmut Lang, Akris, Hakaan, Etam, Ralph Lauren, Ermanno Scervino, Carolina Herrera, DKNY.
